1303590.name: Dura Vita Online
1303590.description:
PLAY HOW YOU WANT: There are no classes or restrictions. You want to wield a two-handed axe and wear cloth armor? Go for it!

MULTIPLAYER: Smaller scale instanced multiplayer currently supporting only a handful of players per instance.

RANDOM ITEM GENERATOR: Weapons and armor that drop have a chance to apply numerous stats. There are hundreds of combinations!

SKILL UP: There are dozens of skills from long blades to cooking. Level these just by doing them!

EXPLORE: Explore the land and find dungeons and other secrets!

DROP ITEMS ON DEATH: The name is Dura Vita after all. Your inventory loot is dropped but can be recovered. Also a possible weapon or armor piece equipped can drop too.
1303590.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
